titleStmt.title: The VVelchmans life, teath, and periall. Together vvith a long narrow prod list, of the care her tooke in hers life time, to make awle hims frend and acquaintance merry at her teath; abscribing the manner of hers finerall, with fair cost bestowed upon them that comes to hims periall.

The VVelchmans life, teath, and periall. Together vvith a long narrow prod list, of the care her tooke in hers life time, to make awle hims frend and acquaintance merry at her teath; abscribing the manner of hers finerall, with fair cost bestowed upon them that comes to hims periall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Lambert dwelling in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
